creator: mark.shotton@micromass.co.uk
text:
On NT, JikesJavaCompiler passes an incorrectly formatted classpath to Jikes as 
a command-line argument. The leading "/"s in each path contained in the 
classpath should be removed.

This is ( probably ) fixed in 3.3, I know people have used jikes with jasper.
For 3.2, you can use javac or look at the code and send a patch.
creator: cmanolache@yahoo.com
